C quick-sort time elapsed: 0.001 0.001 0.0001 0.001 0.002 0.003 0.002 0.003 0.002 0.003 0.002 0.003 0.003 0.003 0.004 0.003 0.004 0.004 0.004 0.004 0.005 0.005 0.005 0.005 0.005 0.006 0.006 0.006 0.007 0.006 0.009 0.013 0.012 0.013 0.013 0.014 0.013 0.014 0.014 0.014 0.016 0.015 0.017 0.017 0.017 0.018 0.018 0.018 0.019 0.019
C++ quick-sort time elapsed: 0.001 0.001 0.003 0.002 0.001 0.004 0.002 0.003 0.003 0.003 0.004 0.004 0.004 0.005 0.004 0.005 0.005 0.005 0.005 0.006 0.006 0.006 0.007 0.007 0.008 0.008 0.008 0.008 0.008 0.009 0.011 0.01 0.01 0.01 0.01 0.012 0.012 0.011 0.012 0.013 0.013 0.013 0.013 0.013 0.013 0.015 0.015 0.016 0.015 0.015

C quick-sort working faster on smaller massive, but it loses in speed to C++ qsort on big data.
